attributes.action: Put the Brexit options to the people to decide a clear way forward.
attributes.background: Parliament and commons cannot come to a decision about brexit, we the people want to have a say in how to move forward. Be it leave with no deal, cancel brexit or other alternatives.

rejection.details:
We aren't sure exactly which options you would like to be put in a referendum.

You might to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250135
